notifications.welcome: Welcome to Loopia Dyndns. Go to app settings page to configure domain name and login details.
notifications.nohost: Loopia returned that the configured host does not exist. Please create an A-record using Loopias DNS editor
notifications.badauth: The configured username and password failed to authenticate with Loopia

settings.title: Loopia Dyndns
settings.info: Enter your loopia login details and domain name to dynamically update.
